thread.title: Voip & Voice Recording Technology Company

title: Voip & Voice Recording Technology Company
text: Questions Business Summary Full service VOIP Technologies and Voice Recording Company. Proprietary voice recording system. Supplies, installs, and services proprietary voice recording and ShoreTel telephony systems for small, medium, and large businesses. Clientele primarily in South Texas. Over 50 service agreements in place. Office currently in West Houston but location is not critical to the business model. 28 year old company with excellent reputation. 2014 was a strong year as clients began to make capital expenditures required to upgrade telephony systems. Seller is willing to stay on as required to ensure a smooth transition of clientele and technologies. Proprietary Voice Recording system provides a competitive and cost advantage in the market place. Seller financing available for qualified buyer. Financials
